alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Fergus County below 4500ft; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 24 at 3:31PM MST until February 25 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton, Eastern Toole and Liberty, Fergus County below 4500ft and Western and Central Chouteau County. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Fergus County below 4500ft; Western and Central Chouteau County
